products.title: Dupioni Faux Silk Shimmering Grey Roman Blind
products.description: The dupioni faux silk shimmering grey roman blind delivers on both style and grace. Its tone is neither too light nor too dark, and charcoal slubs bring a touch of character to the fabric. Thanks to the neutral colourway, this blind simply works in a whole host of themes, from the dupioni faux silk shimmering grey roman blind delivers on both style and grace.

products.title: Shimmer Ochre Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: How opulent would this shimmer roman blind look in your home? It doesnt matter if your place is understated or brimming with lavishness, this ochre blind will be the perfect accent. The plain style wont cloud your living room, but it will generate interest as the sunshine glints off the metallic yarn weve woven through the fabric. Product id: db-rom1119 fabric colour: ochre yellow material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Shimmer Gold Roman Blind
products.description: There are times when another pattern is overkill, but you still want to add a different dimension. The shimmer roman blind does just that. Weve laced it with gold metallics within a textured fabric so every element catches the light. Add this to an already busy living room as an accent, or make these blinds the focus in a simple area. Product id: db-rom1117 fabric colour: gold material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
